entries.title_d: During your attack on Black Sun pirates, one of them turned and fled. We think this may be a sign that the fleeing pirate knows something. Capture it so that we may interrogate the pirate.
entries.title: Dathomir System: Capture the Fleeing Black Sun Pirate
entries.thanks_5: They just are not willing to let us go.
entries.thanks_4: Hang in there. There can't be that many pirates left.
entries.thanks_3: I feel much safer with you flying escort.
entries.thanks_2: Way to drive those pirates away.
entries.thanks_1: Nice work, pilot. You lit those pirates up.
entries.taunt_5: We will find out what you are doing out here, Imperial dog.
entries.taunt_2: Give up your captive or we will be forced to hurt you.
entries.taunt_1: It isn't going to be as easy as you thought.
entries.target_disabled: The fleeing Black Sun pirate's ship has been disabled. Move in close and wait for the boarding operation to get underway.
entries.recovery_success: The fleeing Black Sun pirate has been captured and is ready for interrogation. Good work, pilot.
entries.quest_recover_t: Capture the fleeing Black Sun Pirate's Ship
entries.quest_recover_d: Once the pirate's ship is disabled, move in close, and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.quest_location_d: The fleeing pirate has not yet left the Dathomir system. Track it down and capture it before it can leave the system.
entries.quest_escort_t: Escort the captured Black Sun Pirate
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the captive Black Sun pirate as it is taken to a safe location. Protect it from any attack.
entries.quest_disable_t: Disable the fleeing Black Sun Pirate's Ship
entries.quest_disable_d: The information that pirate has could be important. You have to disable the his ship and capture it for the Empire.
entries.panic_5: Blast it! If they can't free me, they'll destroy my ship rather than let it remain in your hands.
entries.panic_4: You should never have attacked the Black Sun, fool.
entries.panic_3: Great! I'll be free soon. You can't stop them from freeing me!
entries.panic_2: More pirates! They'll defeat you, pilot.
entries.panic_1: Ah... here come more of my comrades. I'll escape you yet.
entries.failed_escape: You have failed to capture the fleeing Black Sun pirate. Return to your superior immediately for debriefing.
entries.failed_destroy: Your orders were to capture that pirate not destroy him. Return to your superior immediately for debriefing.
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 <The transport's escort has been eliminated.>
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:\#pcontrast3 <%DI ships remaining in the transport's escort.>
entries.complete: Mission completed. You have served your Emperor well, pilot.
entries.capture_started: Beginning capture process. Stand by until the Black Sun pirate's ship has been taken.
entries.capture_phase_2: The Black Sun pirates have been eliminated. Initializing restart sequence on the captured ship now.
entries.capture_phase_1: Boarding party reporting in. We are facing resistance. Hold any other fighters off until we have successfully retaken the ship.
entries.capture_complete: The fleeing Black Sun pirate has been captured. Let's escort it out of here.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have located the fleeing pirate! That information has been sent to your nav computer. Disable the ship and capture it.
entries.arrival_phase_1: One of the Black Sun pirates fled from the area. We are scanning the system for its location. Stand by.
entries.angry_disable: You think that you are so very clever. We will see who is clever when this is all over with.
entries.abort: Why have you aborted the recovery operation? Don't let that fleeing pirate get away!
